txt.en: Your mission is to travel to Dul Râkh and stop the Anâkhi cultists there from producing more of their deadly poisons. If you can, slay their head apothecary Goródha as well.
Goródha has shown herself. You must defeat her to stop the Anâkhi's poison production!
Goródha has shown herself in Dul Râkh. Find and defeat her!
Goródha has shown herself in Dul Râkh. Find and defeat her!
Goródha has shown themselves in Dul Râkh, find and defeat her!
The enemies of Urush Dâr use the poison glands of the usan-kûni on their blades. We must do our best to reduce this practice.
'Those cultists won't be a problem any time soon thanks to you. We should return to Ub Nishir.'
Goródha has shown herself. You must defeat her to stop the Anâkhi's poison production!
